text: All - New Fire HD 8 Tablet The new Fire HD 8 Tablet is an ideal gift, not only because of the affordable price, but because of all the amazing features. It has a 10 hour battery life, is enabled with Alexa, and is two times as durable as the iPad Mini 4. The tablet device comes in four different colors, a lightweight body, an 8 - inch HD display, and a snappy processor that make even the most tedious of tasks quick and painless. Do note that an Amazon Prime account is necessary to fully experience the capabilities of the Fire HD.
